TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Localization extends System.Object
public ref class Localization abstract sealed

summary.span: 類別定義當地語系化屬性 (Attribute) 及註解的附加屬性 (Property)。

span.span: The class defines attached properties for localization attributes and comments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標記作者可能會有特定的需求中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]UI，例如文字長度、 字型家族或字型大小的條件約束。Markup authors may have specific requirements for elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] UI, such as constraints for text length, font family, or font size. 還需要了解它們，才能提供一致的當地語系化。Localizers need to know about them in order to provide consistent localization. 當地語系化屬性都可以指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，可讓作者將其當地語系化需要傳達給當地語系化人員。Localization properties can be specified inside [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], allowing authors to communicate their localization needs to localizers. 這些屬性會提供可用來修改應用程式的當地語系化的規則和提示。These properties provide rules and hints for localization, which can be used to modify the application. 有兩種類型的當地語系化屬性：There are two types of localization properties: - 當地語系化屬性。Localization attributes. 屬性會指定哪些資源，例如，要當地語系化。The attributes specify which resources, such as , are to be localized. - 當地語系化註解。Localization comments. 註解是標記作者所包含的自由格式文字。The comments are free-form text that the markup author includes. 如需有關如何使用這些當地語系化屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 當地語系化屬性和註解](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md)。For more information on how to use these localization properties, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示當地語系化屬性和註解文字區塊的定義。The following code example shows localization attributes and comments defined for a text block. [!code-xaml[AttributesSnippets#AttributesSnippet4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AttributesSnippets/CSharp/Comments.xaml#attributessnippet4)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得及設定附加屬性的文字區塊。The following code example shows how to get and set the attached property for a text block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當地語系化屬性指定哪些資源要當地語系化。Localization attributes specify which resources are to be localized. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擷取定義按鈕的當地語系化屬性。The following code example shows how to retrieve the localization attributes defined for a button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當地語系化註解是應用程式開發人員所包含的自由格式文字。Localization comments are free-form text that the application developer includes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擷取定義的文字區塊的當地語系化註解。The following code example shows how to retrieve the localization comments defined for a text block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當地語系化屬性指定哪些資源要當地語系化。Localization attributes specify which resources are to be localized. 如需有關如何定義當地語系化屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 當地語系化屬性和註解](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md)。For more information on how to define localization attributes, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定按鈕的當地語系化屬性。The following code example shows how to set the localization attributes for a button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當地語系化註解是應用程式開發人員所包含的自由格式文字。Localization comments are free-form text that the application developer includes. 如需有關如何定義當地語系化註解的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 當地語系化屬性和註解](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md)。For more information on how to define localization comments, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定當地語系化註解的文字區塊。The following code example shows how to set the localization comments for a text block.
